Title: Field Research
Description:
The nerubians are harvesting Black Blood nearby.

If allowed to persist, the corruption caused by excavating the veins may spread. It will continue until it consumes everything.

I have no intention of sitting and waiting for it to taint the roots. I am trying to learn and understand their methods... so that I may strike at the heart of the operation.

You're welcome to join me.

If, of course, you would also prefer your world not to drown in oozing pools of Black Blood.
ObjectivesText: Investigate the Black Blood harvesting site.
RewardText:
Here in the center of all of this corruption, I hear something calling to me. It pounds in my head like a drum.

I cannot just ignore it.
